$AAPL  Steve Jobs looks like a terrible human being, the iPhone doesn't make up for this https://www.yahoo.com/amphtml/finance/news/memoir-steve-jobs-apos-daughter-133000491.html

links.title: The memoir by Steve Jobs' daughter makes clear he was a truly rotten person whose bad behavior was repeatedly enabled by those around him (AAPL)
links.description: It's been well-established that Apple cofounder Steve Jobs often acted like a jerk. The newly revealed anecdotes add color to the many stories of how Jobs was mean or rude to employees and business partners. The net effect is that Jobs looks like a truly terrible person.

links.title: Apple made more profit in 3 months than Amazon has generated during its lifetime
links.description: Apple is vastly more profitable than Amazon. The smartphone maker generated a $48.35 billion profit during its fiscal 2017 and made $13.8 billion in net income during the March 2018 quarter, while Amazon's total net income since inception is about $9.6 billion. One word may explain Warren Buffett's investment decisions on Apple AAPL and Amazon AMZN : profit.
